graphql.query:
mutation {
    bookConsultation(
        input: { 
            doctorId: "623a4be15eec415b89e0d269"
            date: "2022-03-24"
            fromHour: 10
            fromMin: 15
            patientName: "Oni Victor"
            duration: 30
            consultationId: "consultation1234567"
        }
    ) {
            _id
            doctorId
            patientName
            date
            fromHour
            fromMin
            toHour
            toMin
            duration
            tz
    }
}
